name: ElasticComputeCloudSpotFleetSpotFleetRequestConfigDataLaunchSpecificationsBlockDeviceMappings
description: BlockDeviceMappings is a property of the Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud SpotFleet SpotFleetRequestConfigData LaunchSpecifications property that defines the block devices that are mapped to an instance.

properties.name: DeviceName
properties.description: The name of the device within the EC2 instance, such as /dev/dsh or xvdh.

properties.name: Ebs
properties.description: The Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volume information.

properties.name: NoDevice
properties.description: Suppresses the specified device that is included in the block device mapping of the Amazon Machine Image (AMI).

properties.name: VirtualName
properties.description: The name of the virtual device. The name must be in the form ephemeralX where X is a number equal to or greater than zero (0), for example, ephemeral0.
